snippet: Harris English won the St. Jude Classic for his first PGA Tour title, using birdies on two of the final three holes to hold off Phil Mickelson and Scott Stallings by two strokes.
abstract: Harris English wins St Jude Classic for his first PGA Tour title; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Harris English won the St. Jude Classic for his first PGA Tour title, using birdies on two of the final three holes to hold off Phil Mickelson and Scott Stallings by two strokes.

headline.main: First Tour Win for Harris English at St. Jude Classic
